errors.error_description: Installed mirascope before creating and activating the virtual environment, which is incorrect order
correction_candidates:
python -m venv mirascope_env
source mirascope_env/bin/activate
pip install mirascope

python -m venv mirascope_env
pip install mirascope
source mirascope_env/bin/activate

source mirascope_env/bin/activate
python -m venv mirascope_env
pip install mirascope

pip install mirascope
python -m venv mirascope_env
source mirascope_env/bin/activate
errors.golden_answer:
python -m venv mirascope_env
source mirascope_env/bin/activate
pip install mirascope
